name: FuseFlash
description:
PREMISE

Trapped in eternal darkness, creatures from the depths of the cosmos are coming for you. There is no escape, but you got the light by your side to fight for as long as you can.

A 2D Sci-Fi score-based arcade game that was made and realized within 48 hours.

CONTROLS

Movement: WASD keys
Moving the light: Mouse
Shooting the light when fully charged: Left mouse button

Each area of the light deals different damage (1-3 DMG).
Enemy has 3 HP

FEATURES

- Shot monsters in the face with light.

- Run around.

- Keep going with that.
